refnamediv.refpurpose: Forwards the display over a network

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The tele target forwards the display over a network via TCP to a remote host.
A must be running on the remote host where the final display resides. A normal GGI applications will then use the tele target to forward all graphic operations to the machine running the teleserver.

refsect1.title: Options
refsect1.para: The first argument to display-tele is the hostname to connect to (the display server). The second optional argument is the port on which the server is listening. The default port is 27780.
